title: My Portfolio
description: A Next.js 13 portfolio with animations, Unity and a blog
about_description_1: I consider myself a problem solver, good at time management and self-taught, I love learning new things.
about_description_2: I really enjoy working in multidisciplinary teams as I learn a lot from my colleagues and each project.
about_description_3: I have experience developing software such as web applications, video games, mobile applications (android and iOS), and virtual reality applications.
